Title: 003: Defining the Data Problem, Academia vs Career and R Modeling Libraries with Dr. Wilson Pok
Description:
In this session of the Super Data Science Podcast, I chat with Nano Science PHD turned Data Scientist Dr Wilson Pok. You will learn about the importance of defining business problems, a scientific approach to thinking about data analytics and more.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at https://www.superdatascience.com/3
